about_the_game:
Time to Morp: First Contact is a short sandbox colony sim designed to introduce you to the mechanics and the story of Time to Morp universe! Play alone or with friends, build an outpost, gather resources, unlock equipment and be the first to learn about Morps - curious little creatures that inhabit the planet.


Play your way!


  • 1-4 players - Time to Morp is a great solo experience, but it is even more fun with friends!
  • Customize and decorate - Customize the world as you see fit: add decorations, plant trees or terraform everything around you!
  • Play with Morps - The world is filled with cute and unique creatures - they will help you build, gather resources, and aid in exploration.


Focus on fun!


  • Explore vast worlds - The world is filled with different biomes, unique resources and secrets!
  • Automate everything - You can water, gather or move everything yourself. Or use tools to do it for you!
  • Unlock the technology - From Pumps for transportation, to crafting, researching and so much more!



After landing on a new planet, you discover a spreading corruption that is endangering local creatures, and you make it your task to help cute Morps! You and your Drone companion start gathering resources, building a home base and looking for ways to deal with the nasty problem, all while exploring and uncovering the planet's secrets!

short_description: Time to Morp: First Contact is an introductory colony sim game in which you take care of playful creatures - Morps. Use their help to gather resources, build and decorate a base, set up pipe networks, automate everything and clear corruption that is endangering local creatures.
